articles.title: Flight attendant delivers passenger's baby on board Frontier Airlines flight - CNN
articles.description: A woman gave birth to a healthy baby in a lavatory on board a Frontier Airlines flight, according to a Facebook post from the airline.
articles.content: The passenger went into early labor during the flight from Denver (DEN) to Orlando (MCO), said the post, which was shared on May 17. Flight attendant Diana Giraldo then helped her get to the lavatory… [+1521 chars]
